author: jasl
body:
See attached GIF

![cmd](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1024162/60412807-30435780-9c05-11e9-97f5-3b5db86d9f2d.gif)

Actually including `$PSVersionTable.PSVersion` all commands will trigger this issue, but didn't capture it.

# Environment data

```none
Windows 10 1903 18362.207 Chinese language
PowerShell 6.2.1 x64 installed from its Github releases page
```

comments.author: DHowett
comments.body: This is probably related to PSReadline saving and restoring the codepage before and after every command. If you use `Remove-Module PSReadline`, does it still happen?

comments.author: jasl
iSazonov
comments.body: @daxian-dbw @SteveL-MSFT Coul you move the issue to PSReadline repo?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: This is dupe of https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/964 so no need to transfer

title: Commands made CMD (and Windows Terminal) window flash
